original_text: His own iniquities shall take the wicked himself, and he shall be holden with the cords of his sins.
korean_text: 악인은 자기의 악에 걸리며 그 죄의 줄에 매이나니

sentences.original_text: His own iniquities shall take the wicked himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그 자신의 죄가 악인을 잡을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and he shall be holden with the cords of his sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그의 죄의 밧줄로 묶이게 될 것이다
